sentences.sContent: There's always been a stereotype about successful businessmen.
sentences.sCn: 对成功的商人们总有一种成见。

remMethod.val: stereo(立体的) ＋ type(类型) → 这种立体的类型很老套 → 老套→ 刻板印象

words.tran: 用铅版印刷的；老一套的
把…浇铸成铅版；使成为陈规（stereotype的过去分词）
消毒，杀菌；使成不毛；使绝育；使不起作用

trans.tranOther: A stereotype is a fixed general image or set of characteristics that a lot of people believe represent a particular type of person or thing.
